summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 19850 entitled: "An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the south side of Marion Street in the City of Seattle, from the alley between 2nd Avenue and 3rd Avenue to 3rd Avenue, by grading the same and by constructing concrete sidewalks, all in accordance with Resolution No. 1757 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle" approved December 13, 1908.
